name: It Will Get Better
description:
Again, you play a character going to visit their father's grave on their death anniversary; you reflect on their existence and how you are now. 

If you were to speed run this is would take less than 5 minutes; ENJOY!!

  • Repeatedly interact with the grave to remember.
  • Explore a small graveyard off a road. 
  • Try to not fall off the ground, I don't think you'll have to restart but you might have to take time to get back. :)

This was created as a final for my Animating Memory class. 

*Again this is a proof of concept, I might consider doing more with this.*
